frontmatter.title: Recap of System Design Interview Concepts
frontmatter.description: Maybe you’re just getting started with distributed systems and system design, or you just need a quick recap for your upcoming interview. In either case, in this post, you’ll find the most common concepts of system design and the most important aspects of them. Let’s get started.

frontmatter.title: How to Succeed in Your System Design Interview
frontmatter.description: System design questions can be asked for any level with different expectations from the candidate, but to get a Senior offer, you have to rock this round. Practice makes perfect - like for anything else, it applies for system design interview too. So, keep practicing without taking shortcuts, practice as if it’s the real interview and always follow the same steps to make it perfect.
